segments.text: Hello , this is Mr . Simon . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , this is Wang Li . I want to know the status of the position .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , I can't give you an immediate answer on the matter . It's pending now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When can I know whether I'm accepted or not ?
